content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":178271,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何度だって乗り越えてきたんだもん。","translatedEnglishLine":"We've overcome it countless times."},{"lineNumber":178272,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きっと今度だって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm sure we will this time, too..."},{"lineNumber":178273,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".......\""},{"lineNumber":178274,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大丈夫よね……ランス……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's going to be alright... Rance..."},{"lineNumber":178275,"originalJapaneseLine":"平和を願う者――","translatedEnglishLine":"One who wishes for peace—"},{"lineNumber":178276,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お帰りなさい、謙信様」","translatedEnglishLine":"Welcome back, Kenshin-sama."},{"lineNumber":178277,"originalJapaneseLine":"皆から離れて森の中に入っていた謙信を、","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin, who had separated from everyone and entered the forest,"},{"lineNumber":178278,"originalJapaneseLine":"愛が出迎える。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ai greeted him."},{"lineNumber":178279,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、水場が近くにあって助かる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, it's a relief that there's a water source nearby."},{"lineNumber":178280,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おかげで身を清めることが出来た」","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to that, I was able to purify myself."},{"lineNumber":178281,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦いに赴く前はいつものことですが、","translatedEnglishLine":"It's usual before going into battle,"},{"lineNumber":178282,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日は念入りでしたね」","translatedEnglishLine":"but today you were especially thorough."},{"lineNumber":178283,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".......\""},{"lineNumber":178284,"originalJapaneseLine":"「天下太平、平和な世を作る為の戦いは、","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle to create a peaceful world under heaven,"},{"lineNumber":178285,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これが最後となるだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"will probably be the last."},{"lineNumber":178286,"originalJapaneseLine":"「平和、か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Peace, huh..."},{"lineNumber":178287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誰もが何にも怯えずに済む世界……」","translatedEnglishLine":"A world where no one needs to fear anything..."},{"lineNumber":178288,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、謙信様の念願……","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, Kenshin-sama's cherished wish..."},{"lineNumber":178289,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう少しでそれが実現されます」","translatedEnglishLine":"It will be realized soon."},{"lineNumber":178290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Indeed."},{"lineNumber":178291,"originalJapaneseLine":"「愛、見届けてくれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ai, please witness this."},{"lineNumber":178292,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして、もしその世界が成った時には、","translatedEnglishLine":"And when that world comes to be,"},{"lineNumber":178293,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その力を世界の安寧の為に使って欲しい」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want you to use that power for the world's tranquility."},{"lineNumber":178294,"originalJapaneseLine":"「平和な世界には、","translatedEnglishLine":"A peaceful world needs,"},{"lineNumber":178295,"originalJapaneseLine":"　愛のような人間が必要だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"people like Ai."},{"lineNumber":178296,"originalJapaneseLine":"「約束するまでもないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"There's no need to promise."},{"lineNumber":178297,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私は最初から謙信の願いの為に","translatedEnglishLine":"From the beginning, I have been with you for your wish,"},{"lineNumber":178298,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一緒にいるんだから」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin."},{"lineNumber":178299,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あなたも一緒よ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're with me too, right?"},{"lineNumber":178300,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一緒に……叶えましょうね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Together... let's make it come true."},{"lineNumber":178301,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、ありがとう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, thank you."},{"lineNumber":178302,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さ、朝ご飯にしましょう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Now then, let's have breakfast."},{"lineNumber":178303,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日はいつもより沢山食べるでしょう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You'll be eating more than usual today, right?"},{"lineNumber":178304,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、大盛りを頼む」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, I'll order a large portion."},{"lineNumber":178305,"originalJapaneseLine":"皆、一言では言い表せない思いを抱えて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone stood here now, harboring feelings that couldn't be summed up in a word."},{"lineNumber":178306,"originalJapaneseLine":"今この場に立っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"They were standing in this place at this moment."},{"lineNumber":178307,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........."},{"lineNumber":178308,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":178309,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".......\""},{"lineNumber":178310,"originalJapaneseLine":"森の入り口付近で、","translatedEnglishLine":"Near the forest's entrance,"},{"lineNumber":178311,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラはイライラと足を踏みならしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera was stamping her feet irritably."},{"lineNumber":178312,"originalJapaneseLine":"「遅い！","translatedEnglishLine":"You're late!"},{"lineNumber":178313,"originalJapaneseLine":"　偵察班はいつまで時間をかけるつもりだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"How long does the reconnaissance team intend to take?!"},{"lineNumber":178314,"originalJapaneseLine":"「落ち着きなさい、サテラ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Calm down, Satera."},{"lineNumber":178315,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間と協力している以上、","translatedEnglishLine":"Since we're cooperating with humans,"},{"lineNumber":178316,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間より強い魔人が","translatedEnglishLine":"as demons stronger than humans,"},{"lineNumber":178317,"originalJapaneseLine":"　余裕を失うのはよくないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"it's not good for us to lose our composure."},{"lineNumber":178318,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うくっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh..."},{"lineNumber":178319,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それは分かってるが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I understand that, but..."},{"lineNumber":178320,"originalJapaneseLine":"「落ち着いて、サテラ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Calm down, Satera."},{"lineNumber":178321,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間と協力している以上、","translatedEnglishLine":"Since we're cooperating with humans,"},{"lineNumber":178322,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間より強い魔人が","translatedEnglishLine":"as demons stronger than humans,"},{"lineNumber":178323,"originalJapaneseLine":"　余裕を失うのはよくないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"losing composure is unwise."},{"lineNumber":178324,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うくっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh..."},{"lineNumber":178325,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それは分かってるが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I know that, but..."},{"lineNumber":178326,"originalJapaneseLine":"「仕方ありません、","translatedEnglishLine":"It can't be helped,"},{"lineNumber":178327,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きっと今まで以上に慎重に動いて、","translatedEnglishLine":"they're surely moving more cautiously than ever before,"},{"lineNumber":178328,"originalJapaneseLine":"　時間がかかっているんだと思います」","translatedEnglishLine":"so it's taking more time, I believe."},{"lineNumber":178329,"originalJapaneseLine":"「辛いと思いますが、","translatedEnglishLine":"I know it's tough,"},{"lineNumber":178330,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう少しだけ辛抱をお願いします……」","translatedEnglishLine":"but please bear with it just a little longer..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何度だって乗り越えてきたんだもん。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sure we will this time, too...
It's going to be alright... Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆から離れて森の中に入っていた謙信を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin, who had separated from everyone and entered the forest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、水場が近くにあって助かる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, it's a relief that there's a water source nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おかげで身を清めることが出来た」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to that, I was able to purify myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦いに赴く前はいつものことですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's usual before going into battle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は念入りでしたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but today you were especially thorough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「天下太平、平和な世を作る為の戦いは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle to create a peaceful world under heaven,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが最後となるだろう」
「誰もが何にも怯えずに済む世界……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A world where no one needs to fear anything...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう少しでそれが実現されます」
「そして、もしその世界が成った時には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And when that world comes to be,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その力を世界の安寧の為に使って欲しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to use that power for the world's tranquility.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛のような人間が必要だ」
「私は最初から謙信の願いの為に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the beginning, I have been with you for your wish,
Together... let's make it come true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はいつもより沢山食べるでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You'll be eating more than usual today, right?
Yes, I'll order a large portion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆、一言では言い表せない思いを抱えて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone stood here now, harboring feelings that couldn't be summed up in a word.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今この場に立っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were standing in this place at this moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラはイライラと足を踏みならしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera was stamping her feet irritably.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 偵察班はいつまで時間をかけるつもりだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How long does the reconnaissance team intend to take?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 余裕を失うのはよくないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's not good for us to lose our composure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 余裕を失うのはよくないわ」
きっと今まで以上に慎重に動いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they're surely moving more cautiously than ever before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間がかかっているんだと思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it's taking more time, I believe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう少しだけ辛抱をお願いします……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but please bear with it just a little longer...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何度だって乗り越えてきたんだもん。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sure we will this time, too...
It's going to be alright... Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆から離れて森の中に入っていた謙信を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin, who had separated from everyone and entered the forest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、水場が近くにあって助かる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, it's a relief that there's a water source nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おかげで身を清めることが出来た」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to that, I was able to purify myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦いに赴く前はいつものことですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's usual before going into battle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は念入りでしたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but today you were especially thorough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「天下太平、平和な世を作る為の戦いは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle to create a peaceful world under heaven,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが最後となるだろう」
「誰もが何にも怯えずに済む世界……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A world where no one needs to fear anything...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう少しでそれが実現されます」
「そして、もしその世界が成った時には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And when that world comes to be,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その力を世界の安寧の為に使って欲しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to use that power for the world's tranquility.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛のような人間が必要だ」
「私は最初から謙信の願いの為に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the beginning, I have been with you for your wish,
Together... let's make it come true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はいつもより沢山食べるでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You'll be eating more than usual today, right?
Yes, I'll order a large portion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆、一言では言い表せない思いを抱えて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone stood here now, harboring feelings that couldn't be summed up in a word.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今この場に立っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were standing in this place at this moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラはイライラと足を踏みならしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera was stamping her feet irritably.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 偵察班はいつまで時間をかけるつもりだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How long does the reconnaissance team intend to take?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 余裕を失うのはよくないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's not good for us to lose our composure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 余裕を失うのはよくないわ」
きっと今まで以上に慎重に動いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they're surely moving more cautiously than ever before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間がかかっているんだと思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it's taking more time, I believe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう少しだけ辛抱をお願いします……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but please bear with it just a little longer...
